title: Lepturgotrichona bordoni
content:
Lepturgotrichona bordoni is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Monné and Martins in 1976.[1]

This Acanthocinini article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
